name: Mold of Idolatry
simple_desc: Creates a Special Dimension. Enemies within the dimension are Taunted. After entering battle with enemies in this dimension, there is a high chance to reduce SPD of enemy targets.
desc: After using Technique, creates a Special Dimension that Taunts nearby enemies, lasting for #1[i] second(s). After entering battle with enemies in this Special Dimension, there is a #2[i]% base chance to reduce each single enemy target's SPD by #3[i]% for #4[i] turn(s). Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.
